```{r}
library(PSweight)
```


```{r}
data(psdata)
```

Propensity and outcome models

```{r}
ps.formula  <- trt ~ cov1+cov2+cov3+cov4+cov5+cov6
out.formula <- Y   ~ cov1+cov2+cov3+cov4+cov5+cov6
```

```{r}
ato1  <-
  PSweight(
    ps.formula = ps.formula,
    yname = 'Y',
    data = psdata,
    weight = 'overlap'
  )
summary(ato1)
```


```{r}
ato2 <-
  PSweight(
    ps.formula = ps.formula,
    yname = 'Y',
    data = psdata,
    augmentation = TRUE,
    out.formula = out.formula,
    family = 'gaussian',
    weight = 'overlap'
  )

summary(ato2)
```
